cit.ini how to
[HOWTO] 

	we stored many information in /etc/cit.ini:
	Version:
		usb scan
		rootfs
		kernel
		application
	Serial Number:
		SN
		
	cit.ini example:

	[version]
        rootfs = 1.0		; rootfs 
        app   = 1.0		; cit200 application version, need application to modify
        usb_scan  =  1.0	; read from /proc/driver/scanner  
        kernel = 2.6.26		; read from /proc/version
	[serial number]
        sn = 			; read from /dev/mtdblock/5

CHINA. FuJian Newland Computer CO., Ltd
